scripts.build:ce: dojo build widget && shx cp -r output/dist .temp-dist/
scripts.build:lib: dojo build widget -t lib && shx cp -r output/dist/** .temp-dist
scripts.build:lib:legacy: dojo build widget -t lib -l && shx cp -r output/dist/** .temp-dist
scripts.build:themes: dojo build theme && shx cp -r output/theme/* .temp-dist/theme
scripts.build:meta: shx cp package.json .temp-dist && shx cp README.md .temp-dist
scripts.build:finalize: shx rm -rf output/dist && shx mv .temp-dist/ output/dist
scripts.test:headless: dojo build widget -m unit && dojo test -u -c headless
